metadata.dc:author: Gómez, I
Durán, M
Palacio, A
metadata.dc:description: A case of Ebstein's anomaly with pulmonary hypoplasia diagnosed in utero by color Doppler echocardiography in a 26 weeks fetus is presented. We emphasize the importance of ultrasound in the early detection of this congenital abnormality that allowed our medical team to offer correct assistance to a severe ill child at birth.
metadata.dc:title: Anomalía de Ebstein con hipoplasia pulmonar. Diagnóstico mediante ecocardiografía Doppler color en el feto.
[Ebstein's anomaly with pulmonary hypoplasia. Diagnosis with Doppler color echocardiography in the fetus].
